title: WikiLeaks Reveals CIA Cyber-Spying Tactics (Audio)
itunes:title: WikiLeaks Reveals CIA Cyber-Spying Tactics (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Stephen Vladeck, a professor at the University of Texas School of Law, and William Banks, Director of the Institute for National Security and Counterterrorism at Syracuse University College of Law, discuss new documents released by WikiLeaks, which, if true, show the extent of the CIA's abilities to use personal technology devices to monitor seemingly private conversations and messages. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
